<title level="1" right="Hazard 9" pfs="">[Spirit Cyclone](/Hazards.aspx?ID=154)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Complex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=30" />
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 68</row>

**Complexity** Complex

</column>

A cyclone of angry spirits surges around the area.

---

**Stealth**
+20 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 30 [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) or [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) (trained) to weaken the haunt; three total successes in any combination are required to disable the haunt

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Gather Spirits** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** Two or more creatures enter the area; **Effect** A spiraling column of spirits gather, becoming a whirling cyclone of souls 10 feet wide and 60 feet tall. The haunt then rolls initiative.

---
**Routine**
(3 actions) The spirit cyclone uses 3 actions to move, traveling up to 30 feet with each action and dealing 2d10+13 negative damage to each creature in its path (DC 32 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature needs to attempt only one save during the cyclone's movement, even if the cyclone moves over its space more than once. On a critical failure, a creature is swept up into the cyclone, becoming [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) ([Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) DC 32). A creature grabbed by the cyclone moves along with the cyclone and takes 1d10+6 additional negative damage at their beginning of its turn, and it must attempt a Reflex save against the cyclone on the cyclone's turn, no matter where the cyclone moves. A creature that successfully Escapes from the cyclone falls from a height of 1d12 × 5 feet.

---
**Reset**
The spirit cyclone disperses after 1 minute and resets after 1 day.
